snippet.title: Loot River - Official Gameplay Trailer | Day of the Devs 2021
snippet.description:
Here's a fresh new look at Loot River, the upcoming island-shifting action roguelike. Journey down an otherworldly river in search of knowledge and loot when this dungeon crawling roguelike arrives on Xbox and PC.

#GameTrailers #Gaming #SummerOfGaming
